original: Leuhusen, Knut Johan Vilhelm, friherre, major, Linköping, f. 21/8/06 i Sthlm av ryttmäst., frih. Edward L. o. Elisabeth Uggla. G. 38 m. Maud Holmgren. Barn: Claes f. 41, Yvonne 44. — Stud:ex. 26, off:ex. 29, AIHS 30-32, flygsk. 33-34, arméspan :kurs 34, flyginstr :kurs 36, vapenoff :kurs 37-38, utbildn. v. tungt bombflygförb. 44. Fänrik v. Smål. arméart :reg. 29, und :-löjtn. 31, löjtn. 33, löjtn. v. flygv. 36, kapt. där 39 o. major 45. Regements-off. v. Ostgöta flygflottilj 46. RSO.
translated: Leuhusen, Knut Johan Vilhelm, Baron, Major, Linköping, b. 21/8/06 in Stockholm to Captain Edward L. and Elisabeth Uggla. Married in 1938 to Maud Holmgren. Children: Claes b. 1941, Yvonne b. 1944. Education: Secondary School Diploma 1926, Officer's Exam 1929, Military Academy of the Allied Institute of Higher Studies 1930-1932, Flight School for the Air Force 1933-1934, Army Span: Course 1934, Flight Instructor's Course 1936, Weapon Officer's Course 1937-1938, Training at a Heavy Bomber Squadron 1944. Commissioned Officer at Småland Army Artillery Regiment 1929, Second Lieutenant 1931, Lieutenant 1933, Lieutenant in the Air Force 1936, Captain in the same year 1939, and Major in 1945. Regimental Officer at the East Gothia Air Wing 1946. Received the Royal Order of the Sword (RSO).
